name: Bush Elementary School
description: Bush Elementary School is a public elementary school serving students in grades Pre-K through 5th grade in the Laurel County School District. The school serves approximately 550 students and is located in the rural community of Laurel County, Kentucky. Bush Elementary was named a National Blue Ribbon School in 2015 by the U.S. Department of Education, recognizing academic excellence and progress in closing achievement gaps.
source: Verified from official Laurel County Schools website and Kentucky Department of Education records
hours_of_operation: Monday-Friday 7:30 AM-3:30 PM (School hours), Office hours may vary
eligibility_requirements: Students must reside in the Bush Elementary attendance zone within Laurel County School District. Open to students in grades Pre-K through 5th grade.
populations_served: Elementary school students (Pre-K through 5th grade) in the Bush Elementary attendance zone
cost_information: Free public education. No tuition required for residents of the school district.
